description: Sent if a failure (S.M.A.R.T) has been predicted on a hard disk.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SNI-HD-MIB::sniSMARTFailurePredicted SNI-HD-MIB::sniHdTrapServerName s EXAMPLE SNI-HD-MIB::sniHdTrapTime i 9999 SNI-HD-MIB::sniHdTrapDeviceName s EXAMPLE SNI-HD-MIB::sniHdTrapDeviceIndexPerAdapter i 9999 SNI-HD-MIB::sniHdTrapAdapterName s EXAMPLE SNI-HD-MIB::sniHdTrapAdapterNumber i 9999

description: Name of server the trap occurred
variables.name: SNI-HD-MIB::sniHdTrapServerName

description: Time the trap occurred (in seconds since 01/01/1970 00:00h)
variables.name: SNI-HD-MIB::sniHdTrapTime

description: Symbolic name of the harddisk device
variables.name: SNI-HD-MIB::sniHdTrapDeviceName

description: Index of the device for its adapter
variables.name: SNI-HD-MIB::sniHdTrapDeviceIndexPerAdapter

description: Number of the adapter in adapter table
variables.name: SNI-HD-MIB::sniHdTrapAdapterNumber

description: Sent if S.M.A.R.T configuration has been changed.

event.Summary: SMART monitoring disabled on hard disk $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SNI-HD-MIB::sniSMARTMonitoringDisabled SNI-HD-MIB::sniHdTrapServerName s EXAMPLE SNI-HD-MIB::sniHdTrapTime i 9999 SNI-HD-MIB::sniHdTrapDeviceName s EXAMPLE SNI-HD-MIB::sniHdTrapDeviceIndexPerAdapter i 9999 SNI-HD-MIB::sniHdTrapAdapterName s EXAMPLE SNI-HD-MIB::sniHdTrapAdapterNumber i 9999

description: Name of server the trap occurred
variables.name: SNI-HD-MIB::sniHdTrapServerName

description: Time the trap occurred (in seconds since 01/01/1970 00:00h)
variables.name: SNI-HD-MIB::sniHdTrapTime

description: Symbolic name of the harddisk device
variables.name: SNI-HD-MIB::sniHdTrapDeviceName

description: Index of the device for its adapter
variables.name: SNI-HD-MIB::sniHdTrapDeviceIndexPerAdapter

description: Number of the adapter in adapter table
variables.name: SNI-HD-MIB::sniHdTrapAdapterNumber
